Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory4.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Gray Raven... Hang in there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Speaking of which, you haven't said a thing so far. People won't even know you're here if you don't say something, Wanshi.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Where are the people? There's only the three of us here.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I know we're looking for them, but are we going to do that on foot? We're pretty far from the target location. Should we ask Babylonia to airdrop a vehicle? That'll get us there sooner.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Vehicles won't do well on these roads.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Why not? These roads are wide enough.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi quietly lifts a finger and points at the distance.'}

{3: 'The others stop moving. For a moment, all they can hear is the swooshing wind, but soon the rumbling sound of waves comes loud and clear. A crimson red line emerges between the cement gray buildings and is quickly approaching.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's ridiculous! It's at least three meters tall!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Well, we don't have to look for it anymore. Even though our mission priority has changed, we still have time to get a sample.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Yeah. Let's find a vantage point before the Red Tide gets here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I have to say... that thing looks so... gross. I don't want to be anywhere near it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'According to Asimov\'s initial analysis, it\'s a combination of the Punishing Virus with certain "impurities."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Look at the concentration of Punishing Virus. I don't think anyone would dare to get close to it unless they're as special as Camu...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Why don't you ask Camu to check it out?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'He accepted a mission as a freelancer, so we separated before I landed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I wonder how he's doing now...", 4: '2'}
